thread.title: THAT Star Wars trailer racks up 128 million views in just 24 hours - Movies
thread.title_full: THAT Star Wars trailer racks up 128 million views in just 24 hours - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Rachel Babbage
title: THAT Star Wars trailer racks up 128 million views in just 24 hours - Movies
text: After two incredibly teasing teaser trailers, this week finally saw the release of the full trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens.And boy was it a good one. We're more excited than ever for December 18 and bursting with questions. © Disney / Lucasfilm And it seems we're not the only ones who appreciated it. According to the official Star Wars website, it notched up a whopping 128 million views in just 24 hours.More than 16 million watched during the broadcast of ESPN's Monday Night Football and a further 112 million fans viewed it on YouTube.Records were also broken for the number of presale tickets sold, with the internet crashing as fans desperately tried to secure their seats. © Disney / Lucasfilm "All of us at Lucasfilm are totally overwhelmed by the enthusiasm we've seen from fans this week and throughout the lead-up to this film," reads an official statement. "And we still have 56 days to go until the official December 18 release date!"Thank you all for making the Star Wars universe what it is, and for keeping it alive and growing and meaningful. Star Wars is back and beginning an exciting new journey, and it's because of you."Roll on December 18 we say.Oh, and here's one more look at that epic trailer: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4567297770001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14567297770001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4567297770001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4567297770001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14567297770001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4567297770001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
